NK087(shu)001:1: // gsang sngags bla na med pa'i tan+t+ra'i don gyi rnam dbye gsal byed bzhugs so //
NK087(shu)001:2: o rgyan rdo rje 'chang la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK087(shu)001:3: gsang sngags bla na med pa'i tan+t+ra'i don gyi go ba 'di ltar shes par bya ste /
NK087(shu)001:4: spyir rgyu'i theg pa las 'bras bu'i theg pa ni
NK087(shu)001:5: thabs mang ba dang myur ba dang shes rab zab
NK087(shu)001:7: khyad par sngags phyi ba las nang pa ni lta
NK087(shu)001:8: ba dang ting nge 'dzin dang spyod pas phye bar
NK087(shu)001:9: shes dgos / sngags nang pa la yang pha ma gnyis med kyi rgyud gsum du dbye ba'ang /
NK087(shu)001:10: gtso bor rdzogs rim gyi khyad par las 'jog la /
NK087(shu)001:11: de yang thabs rang lus la brten pa dang /
NK087(shu)001:12: shes rab gzhan lus la brten pa dang /
NK087(shu)001:13: thabs shes gnyis med kyi 'bras bu lhan skyes gtso
NK087(shu)001:14: bor ston pa'i sgo nas 'jog /gtso bor ston lugs
NK087(shu)001:15: kyang / ston pas rgyud de dang der dngos bstan rgya che chung dang /
NK087(shu)001:16: rjes 'jug lam pas mos pa dang dbang po'i khyad
NK087(shu)001:17: par gyis nyams len gyi gzhung shing gang la byed
NK087(shu)001:18: pa dag gi sgo nas 'byed pa las /
NK087(shu)001:19: don la gang zag gcig gi nyams len du gsum
NK087(shu)001:20: kha rgyu 'bras kyi tshul du tshang dgos pa las
NK087(shu)001:21: gang rung gcig ya bral bas 'grub pa ma yin
NK087(shu)001:22: no // bskyed rim rgyas bsdus kyi sgo nas phye
NK087(shu)001:23: ba ni rag pa tsam las zhib par ni min
NK087(shu)001:24: no // te / pha rgyud du grags pa gsang
NK087(shu)001:25: 'dus dang gshed skor ma rgyud du grags pa bde
NK087(shu)001:29: gnyis med rgyud du grags pa dus 'khor dang /
NK087(shu)001:31: rdor sems sgyu d+r+wa sogs la bskyed rim shas che
NK087(shu)001:32: chung gi khyad par mi 'byung ba mngon sum pas
NK087(shu)001:33: gsal lo // de las snga 'gyur ba'i chos skad thun mong ma yin pa bskyed pa ma h+aa /
NK087(shu)001:35: rdzogs chen a ti zhes gsum du phye ba yang /
NK087(shu)001:36: pha ma gnyis med kyi rgyud gsum so sor thad
NK087(shu)001:37: drang du sbyar ba'ang 'ol spyi tsam te ma h+aa'i
NK087(shu)001:38: tan+t+ra bco brgyad la yang nang gses kyi pha ma
NK087(shu)001:39: gnyis med kyi rgyud gsum du dbyer yod pa dang
NK087(shu)001:40: / de mtshungs a nu dang a ti gnyis la
NK087(shu)001:41: yang nang gses kyi rnams 'byed phra mo yod pa
NK087(shu)001:42: / yin no // des na 'dir ni bskyed pa
NK087(shu)001:43: ma h+aa yo ga ni chos thams cad kyi gzhi
NK087(shu)001:44: / yin no // lta bu / rdzogs pa a
NK087(shu)001:45: nu yo ga ni chos thams cad kyi lam lta
NK087(shu)001:46: / yin no // lta bu / bu / rdzogs
NK087(shu)001:47: chen a ti yo ga ni chos thams cad kyi
NK087(shu)001:49: zhes ji skad gsung ba bzhin du /
NK087(shu)001:50: pha ma gnyis med kyi rgyud gsum po re re
NK087(shu)001:51: bzhin yang bskyed rdzogs rdzogs chen gsum re yod par
NK087(shu)001:52: shes dgos so // sngags nang par gtogs pa'i lam tshang la ma nor ba zhig yin phyin /
NK087(shu)001:53: sbyang gzhi sbyong byed tshang ba'i bskyed rim zhig dang /
NK087(shu)001:54: gsal bde mi rtog pa'i thabs la brten pa'i rgyu'i rdzogs rim zhig dang /
NK087(shu)001:55: thabs byung 'bras bu'i rdzogs rim mam rdzogs pa chen
NK087(shu)001:56: po ste lam gyi skyel so mthar thug zhig dang
NK087(shu)001:57: gsum med du mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
NK087(shu)001:58: 'o na yo ga sde gsum la rgyud sde dang
NK087(shu)001:59: theg pa'i rnam bzhag so so ba mi rung ngam
NK087(shu)001:60: zhe na / rdo rje 'chang gis dngos bstan gyi lam rim rgya che chung dang /
NK087(shu)001:61: gang zag gis gnas skabs de dang de'i lam bgrod byed yin pas klan ka med do //
NK087(shu)001:62: lam gcig la yo ga gsum ka rdzogs dgos na
NK087(shu)001:63: rdzogs chen gyi rgyud las ma h+aa dang a nu
NK087(shu)001:64: gol sar bstan pa de gang snyam na skabs de
NK087(shu)001:65: dang de'i lta bsgom la mchog 'dzin chen mthar thug
NK087(shu)001:66: gi lam la kha 'gyang ba dang /
NK087(shu)001:67: bya rtsol dang bral ba'i lam la sleb zin pa
NK087(shu)001:68: la bya rtsol gyi lam don med par ston pa'i
NK087(shu)001:69: ched yin te / de 'dra ba de lam gyi thog ma nges 'byung dang /
NK087(shu)001:70: grub mtha'i thog ma bye smra nas brtsams te /
NK087(shu)001:71: mthar thug theg mchog rgyal po 'di la thug gi
NK087(shu)001:72: bar du lam dang grub mtha'i bye brag thams cad
NK087(shu)001:73: la thad ka thad ka'i khyad 'byed re yod pa
NK087(shu)001:74: ni shes kyang sla ba yin no //
NK087(shu)001:75: de ltar spyir shes par byas nas lam dngos la 'jug pa ni /
NK087(shu)001:76: gdul bya'i gang zag rang rang gi khams dbang mos
NK087(shu)001:77: pa'i bye brag las pha ma gnyis med kyi rgyud
NK087(shu)001:78: sde gsum po gang rung zhig la zhugs te bskyed
NK087(shu)001:79: rdzogs rdzogs chen gsum gyi lam gnad tshang la ma
NK087(shu)001:80: 'khrul bar nyams su len shes dgos so //
NK087(shu)001:81: de yang de gsum nyams su len tshul la mtha' gcig tu 'dra ba ma yin te /
NK087(shu)001:82: gang zag la dbang po rno rtul gyi khyad par dang /
NK087(shu)001:83: rnon po la yang rgyu dang sbyangs pa'i rnon po /
NK087(shu)001:84: rtul po la yang rang bzhin dang las kyis sgrib
NK087(shu)001:85: pa'i rtul po sogs gdul bya'i khams dbang ni rgyal
NK087(shu)001:86: ba'i ye shes kyi yul ltar rgya che la /
NK087(shu)001:87: de'i phyir slob ma'i rgyud la rtogs pa skye nges
NK087(shu)001:88: kyi gdams ngag 'debs pa la 'phags lam dang mngon
NK087(shu)001:89: shes thob pa'i slob dpon dgos par gzhung man ngag
NK087(shu)001:90: thams cad nas nan cher gsungs pa yang gnad 'di
NK087(shu)001:91: kas yin no // de ltar gdul bya'i khyad par
NK087(shu)001:92: gyi lam bgrod tshul kyang mtha' yas pa zhig yod
NK087(shu)001:93: kas yin no // de / mthar gyis 'jug pa dang thod rgal pa gnyis /
NK087(shu)001:94: mthar gyis pa la myur bul gyi sgo nas rim gyis pa dang /
NK087(shu)001:96: thod rgal ba la blo stobs che chung gis thod rgal chung 'bring chen po'i rnam bzhag dang /
NK087(shu)001:97: slob tshul gyi sgo nas mos slob dang smin slob gnyis /
NK087(shu)001:98: sa mtshams kyi sgo nas zag bcas dang zag med
NK087(shu)001:99: gnyis sogs lam gyi dbye ba ni mang zhig yod
NK087(shu)001:100: la / de thams cad lam gyi ngo bo'i sgo nas thabs kyi lam dang /
NK087(shu)001:101: shes rab kyi lam gnyis su 'dus pa yin no //
NK087(shu)001:102: de gnyis kyi so skye'i lam du gtso bor 'don
NK087(shu)001:103: lugs kyi sgo nas bzhag pa ma gtogs gang rung
NK087(shu)001:104: ya bral ba'i lam gyis ni mchog 'grub pa med
NK087(shu)001:105: do // thabs grol lam gyi thabs ces pa ni /
NK087(shu)001:106: spyir thabs kyi phyogs su gtogs pa'i cha mang yang dngos ni dbang gsum pa'i lam yin no //
NK087(shu)001:107: shes rab ces pa la phyogs mang yang dngos ni thos bsam sgom pa'i shes rab gsum yin no //
NK087(shu)001:108: des na thabs lam la shes rab kyis ma zin
NK087(shu)001:109: na 'dod chags chos su smra ba dbang phyug gi
NK087(shu)001:110: lam dang khyad med pa dang /
NK087(shu)001:111: shes rab thabs lam gyis ma zin na rgyu'i theg
NK087(shu)001:112: chen dang mtshungs pa las gsang chen thabs kyis che
NK087(shu)001:114: zhes rgyud las bshad pa ltar ro //
NK087(shu)001:115: thabs lam la dbang bzhi char 'jog dgos pa min nam /
NK087(shu)001:116: ci'i phyir gsum pa kho na smros ce na bden mod de /
NK087(shu)001:117: 'dir gtso bo ngos bzung ba yin gyi de'i rgyur
NK087(shu)001:118: bum gsang dang 'bras bur bzhi ba 'ong bas der
NK087(shu)001:119: bsdus pa'o // de bzhin du grol lam gyi gtso bo yang /
NK087(shu)001:120: dngos sgom byung gi shes rab mngon sum rang gsal
NK087(shu)001:121: blo'i yul dang bral ba yin kyang de'i rgyur thos
NK087(shu)001:122: bsam gyi shes rab dang grogs ting nge 'dzin dag
NK087(shu)001:124: de ltar na thabs lam ni lam gyi rgyu'am rkyen
NK087(shu)001:125: dang grol lam ni 'bras bur 'ong ba yin no
NK087(shu)001:126: // thabs lam dang grol lam gnyis 'phags lam 'thob
NK087(shu)001:127: pa la gang myur zhe na rnam par phye nas
NK087(shu)001:128: lan gdabs par bya ba ste grol lam gcig char
NK087(shu)001:129: ba ni thabs lam gcig char ba las kyang myur
NK087(shu)001:130: // la / grol lam rim gyis pa ni thabs
NK087(shu)001:131: lam rim gyis pa las kyang bul ba yin te
NK087(shu)001:133: ma k+shi ka'i dpe bzhin no //
NK087(shu)001:134: da mdo hril gyis dril na sngags bla med kyi
NK087(shu)001:135: lam thams cad bskyed rdzogs rdzogs chen gsum du 'du
NK087(shu)001:136: / gsum ka dbang bzhi yongs rdzogs gcig gi lam du 'du /
NK087(shu)001:137: de yang thabs grol gyi lam gnyis su 'du /
NK087(shu)001:138: 'phags lam la lam gyi rnam bzhag tha dad pa med /
NK087(shu)001:139: dbang gsum pa'i lam ma brten par sngags bla med
NK087(shu)001:140: kyi mthong lam dang mthar thug gi 'bras bu la
NK087(shu)001:141: sbyor mi srid / dbang gsum pa'i lam yin na shes rab mar brten dgos pas khyab kyang /
NK087(shu)001:142: shes rab ma yin na las kyi phyag rgya yin dgos pa ma khyab /
NK087(shu)001:143: rgyu mtshan de'i phyir na grol lam pa dang /
NK087(shu)001:144: bye brag rdzogs chen pa rig pa rang snang gi
NK087(shu)001:145: blo can rnams la dbang bzhi'i lam yongs rdzogs yod
NK087(shu)001:146: kyang des thabs lam pa yin par mi 'gyur /
NK087(shu)001:147: spyir sngags lam la thabs kyi theg pa ces pa'i thabs dang /
NK087(shu)001:148: bye brag thabs grol lam gyi thabs gnyis la spyir
NK087(shu)001:149: btang dang dmigs bsal lam thun mong dang thun min
NK087(shu)001:150: gyi khyad par yod pa shes dgos /
NK087(shu)001:151: des na rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal ldan gsang ba'i
NK087(shu)001:152: snying po lta bu ni spyi rgyud yin pas na
NK087(shu)001:153: pham gnyis med kyi rgyud gang ltar bshad kyang chog
NK087(shu)001:154: pa dang / bskyed rdzogs rdzogs chen gsum gang ltar
NK087(shu)001:155: bkral kyang 'gal ba med la de ltar yin pa
NK087(shu)001:156: yang nges pa'i don dang sgra ji bzhin pa yin
NK087(shu)001:157: pa dang / no // thabs lam dang grol lam
NK087(shu)001:158: gyi khyad par yang rtsa rgyud ni gang gi phyogs
NK087(shu)001:159: su yang ma lhung zhing bshad rgyud sde bzhi so
NK087(shu)001:160: so'i dgongs pas thabs grol so sor 'chad nus pa
NK087(shu)001:161: pa dang / no // nyid do // spyir rgyud don la gzhi lam 'bras bu'i rgyud gsum las /
NK087(shu)001:163: lam rgyud ni nyams su len bya /
NK087(shu)001:164: 'bras rgyud ni thob bya yin la /
NK087(shu)001:165: de'i nang nas kyang gzhi shes byed dang 'bras bu thob byed /
NK087(shu)001:166: nyams len gyi ngo bo dngos ni lam rgyud yin pas de'i rang bzhin shes pa gal che /
NK087(shu)001:167: de yang lta spyod dkyil 'khor sogs rgyud kyi dngos
NK087(shu)001:168: po bcu 'khor dang bcas pa yin kyang de'i nang
NK087(shu)001:169: nas kyang gtso bo che shos lta ba dang ting
NK087(shu)001:170: 'dzin gnyis yin / lta ba ni lhag pa'i bden
NK087(shu)001:171: pa dbyer med blos spyod yul dang bral ba de
NK087(shu)001:172: 'dzin gnyis yin / yin kyang / de 'phags pa'i
NK087(shu)001:173: ye shes mngon sum pa'i yul yin phyir so skyes
NK087(shu)001:174: blos ji bzhin par gtan la 'bebs mi nus /
NK087(shu)001:175: des na 'khor ba dang myang 'das su btags pa'i
NK087(shu)001:176: zhen snang 'di nyid lam thun mong dang thun min
NK087(shu)001:177: gyi gtan tshig rnams kyis gzhal bas rjes dpag gi
NK087(shu)001:178: tshad mas gzhi rgyud kyi don spyi tsam nges pa
NK087(shu)001:179: de lta bar bzhag nas ting nge 'dzin bsgom dgos
NK087(shu)001:180: / ting nge 'dzin de ni gnyis te /
NK087(shu)001:183: dang po bskyed pa'i rim pa de yang /
NK087(shu)001:184: rnal 'byor lnga'i ching gis bcing pa dang /
NK087(shu)001:185: bsnyen bsgrub yan lag bzhi'i ching gis bcing ba gang ltar yang 'dra'o //
NK087(shu)001:186: bskyed rim gyi cho ga ni rtsa rgyud las yi
NK087(shu)001:187: ge 'khor lo'i sprin las sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba'i ting
NK087(shu)001:188: nge 'dzin du sgrub pa tsam las mi gsal yang
NK087(shu)001:189: / bshad rgyud dang sgrub thabs sogs kyi dgongs pas /
NK087(shu)001:190: bdag sras gzhan sras kyi cho ga dang /
NK087(shu)001:192: rdo rje'i cho ga gsum bskyed sogs gang ltar byas kyang 'gal ba med pa'o //
NK087(shu)001:193: rdzogs rim ni grol lam bskyed rim ltar rnal 'byor lnga'i ching gis bcing ba dang /
NK087(shu)001:194: thabs lam steng 'og gi sgo thun mong ba ltar dga' bzhi'i chings su bcing pa dang /
NK087(shu)001:195: thun mong ma yin pa 'khor lo bzhir man ngag
NK087(shu)001:196: bzhi'i rdzogs rim sgom tshul b+ai ma la'i gsang thig
NK087(shu)001:197: nas 'byung ba ltar bsgom pa'i rim pa rnams so
NK087(shu)001:198: // grol lam rnal 'byor lnga'i ching gis bcing ba
NK087(shu)001:199: zur pa'i bshad srol las byung ba ni lam gyi
NK087(shu)001:200: ngo bor rim lnga dang phyogs mtshungs la /
NK087(shu)001:201: rong zom chen po'i dkon mchog 'grel du gsung ba
NK087(shu)001:202: ni rdzogs chen khregs chod kyi gdams pa dang phyogs
NK087(shu)001:203: mtshungs pa'o // bskyed rim nas rdzogs rim la 'jug tshul ni /
NK087(shu)001:204: grol lam gcig char ba bskyed rdzogs chig chod du
NK087(shu)001:205: song nas lam dngos 'phags lam zung 'jug gi ngo
NK087(shu)001:206: bor gyur pa'o // grol lam rim gyis pa dang /
NK087(shu)001:207: thabs lam pa rnams ni bskyed rdzogs rim can du sbyang dgos pa /
NK087(shu)001:208: de yang bskyed rim phyag rgya spros bcas rdzogs nas
NK087(shu)001:209: rdzogs rim gsang dbang gi lam nas rim bzhin 'jug
NK087(shu)001:210: pa dang / phyag rgya gcig spros kyi rten la
NK087(shu)001:211: gsang dbang gi lam sbyangs nas sgyu lus dang 'od
NK087(shu)001:212: gsal mngon du byas te tshogs sgrub sher dbang lam
NK087(shu)001:213: gyi nye rgyus rlung sems las grub pa'i sgyu lus
NK087(shu)001:214: kyi lha sku don gyi 'od gsal du bsdus nas
NK087(shu)001:215: zung 'jug gi lha skur ldang ba dang /
NK087(shu)001:216: nyin mo stong chen rnal 'byor bsgoms nas mtshan mo
NK087(shu)001:217: gnyid kyi 'od gsal dang sbrel te ngu ba sogs
NK087(shu)001:218: kyi mtshan ma mthong ba nas dpe'i 'od gsal bskyed
NK087(shu)001:219: pa rdzogs rim gyi stong chen /
NK087(shu)001:220: snying rje sgyu ma'i 'phen pas nyin mo phyag rgya
NK087(shu)001:221: gcig spros kyi rnal 'byor bsgom pa dang 'brel bar
NK087(shu)001:222: dpe'i 'od gsal las snying rje sgyu ma'i 'phen pas
NK087(shu)001:223: sgyu lus kyi lha sku phyag rgya gcig spros su
NK087(shu)001:225: de'i rnal 'byor tshul de ltar bskyed rdzogs zung 'jug
NK087(shu)001:226: gi lam gyis sbyor lam chos mchog gi bar bgrod
NK087(shu)001:227: nas rten de la tshogs sgrub kyi nye rgyus 'phags
NK087(shu)001:228: lam la sbyor bar bshad pa sogs bshad srol du
NK087(shu)001:229: ma yod / gang ltar rung phyag rgya gcig spros
NK087(shu)001:230: kyis bsdus pa'i bskyed rim lha'i rnal 'byor la nges
NK087(shu)001:231: pa ci rigs rnyed pa'i tshe de dag dang sbrel
NK087(shu)001:232: nas gsang dbang gi lam rlung gi rnal 'byor dang
NK087(shu)001:233: sher dbang gi lam gdams ngag steng sgo dang 'og
NK087(shu)001:234: ste ye shes kyi phyag rgya la rtsal sbyangs pa
NK087(shu)001:235: sogs byas pas stong bzhi dang /
NK087(shu)001:236: dga' bzhi thabs kyi khyad par tsam las lam gyi
NK087(shu)001:237: mngon rtogs sbyor lam bzhi dang don gcig pa skye
NK087(shu)001:238: / de nas las rgya dngos la brten nas mthong
NK087(shu)001:239: lam la sbyor ba la spros bcas spros med kyi
NK087(shu)001:240: spyod pa dus tshod dang 'brel bar bskyangs pas chog
NK087(shu)001:241: / gam snyam / shes dbang gi lam rten khyim
NK087(shu)001:242: pa dang rab byung gang yin kyang thabs kyis ma
NK087(shu)001:244: zin na thabs kyi lam du mnyams pas gzhung ji
NK087(shu)001:245: lta ba bzhin bsnyegs na 'gal ba med dam snyam
NK087(shu)001:246: / bcas rang gi kha na ma tho ba 'bras
NK087(shu)001:247: bu dang bcas pa thob min gyi khyad par 'du
NK087(shu)001:248: shes gsum sgra ji bzhin pa lam du slong min
NK087(shu)001:249: dang chags rtog gi ngo bo bde stong du grol
NK087(shu)001:250: min gyis phye ba don gnas dang /
NK087(shu)001:251: 'phags lam dngos dang de dang bar chad med pa'i
NK087(shu)001:252: lam la sbyangs nas bzod thob ngan song ltung min
NK087(shu)001:253: sogs dang bshad sbyar mdzad pa ni gsang sngags thabs
NK087(shu)001:254: kyi che ba dang ma sbyar zhing rgyu 'bras dang
NK087(shu)001:255: sa lam gyi rnam bzhag spyir btang ba dang bstun
NK087(shu)001:256: pas jo bo'i byang chub lam sgron dang ha lam
NK087(shu)001:258: spyir sa lam 'bras bu'i rnam bzhag thams cad shes dgos kyang /
NK087(shu)001:259: khyad par las dang po pas tshogs sbyor dang /
NK087(shu)001:260: mthong lam la sbyor tshul tshun chad 'di zhib par shes pa gal che /
NK087(shu)001:261: spyir gyis sngags lam dang khyad par rdzogs chen lam
NK087(shu)001:262: gyi myur khyad dang thabs kyi che ba thams cad
NK087(shu)001:263: mthong lam tshun chad du 'don shes dgos kyi /
NK087(shu)001:264: de phan chad ni theg chen yin phyin khyad par cung zad tsam yang yod ces mi smra'o //
NK087(shu)001:265: rgyal ba'i dgongs gsang rgyal sras mchog gi yum //
NK087(shu)001:266: rgyal ba'i lam bzang rdo rje'i theg pa la //
NK087(shu)001:267: nyam chung blo yis dpyad bzod lta ci zhig /dogs pa gcod 'dod bris la nyes pa med //
